snippet: President Obama walks a difficult line in seeking military action on Syria. The American public deserves more answers.
abstract: Editorial contends divided 10-to-7 vote on Senate Foreign Relations Committee authorizing strike against Syria for the use of chemical weapons shows there is no strong consensus on this critical question; calls on Obama administration to offer the public fuller explanations about the extent and goals of the mission.
lead_paragraph: President Obama walks a difficult line in seeking military action on Syria. The American public deserves more answers.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
